foreignData.name: Günstige Auswahl
foreignData.text: Schaue Dir zu Beginn Deiner Ziehphase die obersten zwei Karten Deiner Bibliothek an und wähle eine davon aus. Lege diese Karte unter Deine Bibliothek oder opfere die Günstige Auswahl und bezahle {2}{G}{G}, um diese Karte zu ziehen.

name: Preferred Selection
originalText:
At the beginning of your draw phase, look at the top two cards of your library and choose one. Put that card on the bottom of your library, or sacrifice Preferred Selection and pay o2o
Go
G to draw the card.

rulings.text: This is no longer a draw, it’s simply putting the card into your hand.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. You may sacrifice Preferred Selection and pay {2}{G}{G}. If you do, put one of those cards into your hand. If you don't, put one of those cards on the bottom of your library.
